definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]

sentences.english: Dried rhizome of rehmannia and other herbs are also added.
sentences.chinese: 同时也会加一些干地黄和其他的草药。

sentences.english: He decided to taste all the herbs he could find.
sentences.chinese: 他决定把能找到的草药都尝一尝。

sentences.english: The miraculous effect of medical herbs has raised some conservative eyebrows.
sentences.chinese: 草药的奇效简直使一些思想保守的人瞠目结舌。

sentences.english: This paper tries to explore the application of fine powder technology to Chinese medicinal herbs and insoluble medicines.
sentences.chinese: 本文就难溶药物与中草药微细化技术作出探索性研究。

sentences.english: The mangosteen fruit has a long history of medicinal use in Chinese and Ayurvedic medicine.
sentences.chinese: 山竹果在中医和印度草药医学里的药用历史悠久。

sentences.english: If you have any herbal supplements or remedies, please stay away from me.
sentences.chinese: 如果您有任何辅助草药或疗法，请别过来。

sentences.english: Pepper, Chilli, Coriander Leaf, Cloves , Herbal Spices (Organic.
sentences.chinese: 采购产品胡椒粉，智利，芫荽叶，丁香，草药的药料。

sentences.english: Researches show that Valeriana is a kind of herbal medicine with exploiture future and worthy of researching farther.
sentences.chinese: 缬草是很具有开发前途的中草药，值得进一步研究。

sentences.english: There is no wholesale market for Chinese herbal medicine in Shijiazhuang, where the specific location?
sentences.chinese: 石家庄有没有中草药材批发市场，具体地点在哪里？

sentences.english: Turmeric and sweet basil are commonly used Ayurvedic herbs.
sentences.chinese: 姜黄和罗勒都是常用的阿育吠陀草药。

sentences.english: The study and use of plants for medicinal purposes is the concern of herbalism .
sentences.chinese: 植物药用的研究与应用主要是草药学关注的焦点。

sentences.english: This herb is also pretty common to most people as Safflower.
sentences.chinese: 这种草药也被许多人称为藏红花Safflower。

sentences.english: Chinese herbology presents its own set of research challenges.
sentences.chinese: 中医的草药学向人们的研究提出了自己的挑战。

sentences.english: The 15th to 17th centuries were the most popular time for herbalism in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 十五到十七世纪是欧洲最流行的草药在阶段。

sentences.english: But supporters of Herbology believe it works.
sentences.chinese: 但是支持者认为草药学是行之有效的。

sentences.english: And in the event that you do fall ill, stock up on herbal remedies like ginseng and black elderberry.
sentences.chinese: 倘若你生病了，你可以使用人参和黑接骨木等中草药。

definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]
legendary magic potion of immortals/panacea/fig. wonder solution to a problem
red root gromwell (Lithospermum erythrorhizon)/flowering plant whose roots provide purple dye/arnebia (plant genus in family Boraginaceae)
